src:
Curhatan Pemain Galatasaray Usai Dibantai Real Madrid 6-0
07 Nov 2019, 09:11 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid sukses meraih kemenangan besar ketika menjamu Galatasaray di lanjutan penyisihan grup Liga Champions. Tak tanggung-tanggung, enam gol tanpa balas dihasilkan oleh tim asuhan Zinedine Zidane tersebut.
Real Madrid sudah unggul tiga gol ketika pertandingan baru berjalan 15 menit. Rodrygo mencetak dua gol pada menit keempat dan ketujuh, sementara penalti Sergio Ramos memperbesar keunggulan di menit ke-14. Dan di masa injury time babak pertama Karim Benzema menjadikan skor menjadi 4-0.
Real Madrid semakin agresif di babak kedua. Namun tuan rumah hanya mampu menambah dua gol tambahan melalui Karim Benzema di menit 81 dan Rodrygo melengkapinya dengan hattrick pada menit akhir pertandingan.
Kemenangan ini membuat Los Blancos kini menempel PSG di klasemen sementara grup A Liga Champions dengan tujuh poin. Tertinggal lima poin dari PSG yang ada di puncak klasemen.
Usai pertandingan di Santiago Bernabeu, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari tadi WIB, beberapa pemain Galatasaray memberikan penjelasan mengenai apa yang sebenarnya terjadi pada pertandingan tersebut.
text:
Curhatan Galatasaray Player After Being Slaughtered Real Madrid 6-0
Nov 7, 2019, 09:11 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid successfully won a big victory when entertaining Galatasaray in the Champions League group stage. Unmitigated, six goals without reply produced by Zinedine Zidane's team.
Real Madrid have won three goals when the game has been running for 15 minutes. Rodrygo scored twice in the fourth and seventh minute, while Sergio Ramos's penalty increased the lead in the 14th minute. And in the first half injury time Karim Benzema made the score 4-0.
Real Madrid became more aggressive in the second half. But the host was only able to add two additional goals through Karim Benzema in the 81st minute and Rodrygo completed it with a hat trick in the final minutes of the match.
This victory makes Los Blancos now attached to PSG in the Champions League group A standings with seven points. Behind five points from PSG at the top of the standings.
After the match at the Santiago Bernabeu, Thursday (11/07/2019) early this morning WIB, several Galatasaray players gave an explanation of what actually happened at the match.
